001package net.tvburger.jdl.lenet;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.cnn.*;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.cnn.pooling.AveragePooling;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.datasets.MnistDataSets;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.activations.Activations;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.plots.ImageViewer;
009
010import java.io.IOException;
011
012public class LeNet1 {
013
014    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
015        ConvolutionalLayer layer1 = ConvolutionalLayer.create(new ConvolutionalShape(16, 16), 5, 6, 1, 0, Activations.tanh());
016        PoolingLayer layer2 = PoolingLayer.create(layer1.getOutputShape(), 2, new AveragePooling());
017        ConvolutionalLayer layer3 = ConvolutionalLayer.create(layer2.getOutputShape(), 5, 12, 1, 0, Activations.tanh());
018        FullyConnectedLayer layer4 = FullyConnectedLayer.create(layer3.getOutputShape(), 10, Activations.none());
019        ConvolutionalNetwork convolutionalNetwork = ConvolutionalNetwork.of(layer1, layer2, layer3, layer4);
020
021        DataSet<Float> samples = MnistDataSets.loadDigits();
022        for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
023            DataSet.Sample<Float> sample = samples.samples().get(i);
024            ImageViewer imageViewer = ImageViewer.fromMnistImage(sample);
025            imageViewer.display();
026
027//            ConvolutionalShape input = MnistDataSets.digitAsShape(sample.features());
028//            ConvolutionalShape output = convolutionalNetwork.transform(input);
029//            int digit = shapeAsDigit(output);
030        }
031    }
032
033    private static int shapeAsDigit(ConvolutionalShape output) {
034        Float max = null;
035        int digit = -1;
036        for (int i = 0; i < output.getElements().length(); i++) {
037            if (max == null || output.getElements().get(i) > max) {
038                max = output.getElements().get(i);
039                digit = i;
040            }
041        }
042        return digit;
043    }
044}
